Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: complete project research synthesis

Research files:
- STACK.md: Testing infrastructure \(Vitest\), bundle optimization, dependency cleanup
- FEATURES.md: Table stakes \(accessibility, navigation, mobile\), differentiators, anti-features
- ARCHITECTURE.md: Component refactor patterns, hooks extraction, CSS organization
- PITFALLS.md: Critical bugs \(random values, package conflicts, RAF mixing\)
- SUMMARY.md: Executive summary with 7-phase roadmap implications

Key findings:
- Stack: Add Vitest + RTL, remove lodash/duplicate packages, defer major version upgrades
- Architecture: Migrate Wave class to hooks \(usePerlinNoise, useWaveAnimation, useAnimationFrame\)
- Critical pitfall: Random values regenerated every render causing animation glitches + memory leaks

Recommended phase sequence:
1. Foundation & Cleanup \(testing setup, critical bug fixes\)
2. Component Architecture Refactor \(class to hooks migration\)
3. Navigation & Accessibility \(scroll-to-section, mobile menu, WCAG 2.1 AA\)
4. CSS Organization \(CSS Modules, theme system\)
5. Performance Optimization \(bundle analysis, Core Web Vitals\)
6. Testing Coverage \(80%+ target, error boundaries\)
7. Dependency Updates \(React 19, Vite 7 - future\)

Overall confidence: MEDIUM \(code analysis HIGH, version verification needed\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
